Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BatteryPresent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="PowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Capacity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BatteryPresent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="PowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Capacity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
